email_text:
Subject: Urgent: Temporary Account Suspension Notice from Bank of America

Dear Valued Bank of America Customer,

We regret to inform you that your Bank of America account has been flagged for suspicious activity and is at risk of being temporarily suspended. In order to protect your account from unauthorized access and potential fraud, we are taking immediate action to suspend your account until further verification can be completed.

To prevent any inconvenience and ensure the security of your account, we kindly ask you to click on the link provided below to verify your account information and confirm your identity:

[Phishing link]

Please note that failure to confirm your account details within the next 24 hours may result in the permanent suspension of your Bank of America account. We take the security of our customers' accounts very seriously and urge you to act promptly to avoid any disruptions to your banking services.

Thank you for your cooperation and understanding in this matter. We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause, but your security is our top priority.

Sincerely,
Bank of America Security Team

Please do not reply to this email. This is an automated message.
